basics.name: Nhut Minh Nguyen
basics.label: Ungraduated Research Assistants
basics.summary: As an enthusiastic research assistant in the field of artificial intelligence, I am passionate about advancing technologies that enhance human-computer interaction.

work.name: AI Technology and Application Research Lab, FPT University
work.summary: Conducting research in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and speech processing to develop and enhance AI-driven solutions for visual and auditory data analysis.

education.institution: FPT University, Ho Chi Minh City Campus

awards.title: The Student Research Competition at FPT University
awards.summary: In this competition, my colleagues and I are dedicating our efforts to the cutting-edge realm of Voice-based Age and Gender detection using Long Short-term Memory (LSTM) technology. With a shared passion for innovation and a drive to push the boundaries of what's possible, we're delving into the intricate nuances of voice data to create robust and accurate detection models.

certificates.name: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
